result.execSummary:
The defendant Dennis G Wood was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: In the event of non-payment of outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dennis G Wood

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dennis G Wood in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  John M. O'Boyle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense relates agreement. State moves to amend to 947.01(1) without the domestic abuse enhancer/surcharge. Court grants amendment. 
Defendant pleads guilty to amended count 1. Court accepts the plea and finds the Defendant guilty. 
Argument by State. Argument by Defense. Defendant addresses the court. 

Court relates and orders : 
Costs. 
Must submit DNA sample and pay the surcharge. 

Order for DNA given to the defendant in court.
Defendant Dennis G Wood in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  John M. O'Boyle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea hearing scheduled for January 14, 2016 at 11:45 am.

Plea hearing at 01-06-2016 02:00 pm.
Jury trial at 01-20-2016 08:00 am.
to appear signed by the defendant for the public defenders office.

Attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond in court.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Authorization to appear filed. JT set for 1/20/16 at 8:00 a.m.  Plea hearing scheduled for January 6, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.

Must have no contact with Samantha M. except for third party (agreed upon person by parties) for child visitation and placement. May go one time with law enforcement to obtain personal belongings.

10/27/2015: THIS BOND IS MODIFIED FROM NO CONTACT WITH SAMANTHA M. TO NO ABUSIVE CONTACT WITH SAMANTHA M.  ALL OTHER CONDITIONS TO REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

Defendant Dennis G Wood in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense requests bond modification from no contact with Samantha M. to must have no abusive contact with Samantha M. State does not object. Court grants and orders the bond be amended.
